select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into product (product_descripton,product_url_click,product_status,product_url,product_count,product_view,product_rank,product_type_id,product_name) values (#{productDescripton},#{productUrlClick},#{productStatus},#{productUrl},#{productCount},#{productView},#{productRank},#{productTypeId},#{productName})
